images.imgDate: Feathered wings granting flight; enhanced vision; later forms include regenerative healing and metal wings as Archangel.
Produces powerful sonic screams capable of flight, concussive force, and sound manipulation.
Can transform his body into organic steel, granting superhuman strength, durability, and endurance.
Absorbs cosmic energy and projects it as powerful plasma blasts from his body.
Manipulates moisture to create and control ice; can transform his body into organic ice form.
Master of magnetism; can manipulate magnetic fields, control metal, and generate force fields.
Teleportation, wall-crawling, superhuman agility, and shadow-blending; prehensile tail and night vision.
Controls the weather; can summon storms, manipulate wind, lightning, and temperature.
Accelerated healing factor, enhanced senses and strength, retractable adamantium claws.
Immortality, molecular control, super strength, shapeshifting, and access to advanced Celestial technology.
Generates superheated plasma, enabling flight and powerful fire-based attacks.
Superhuman speed, reflexes, and accelerated perception.
Projects powerful concussive optic blasts from his eyes, controlled with ruby quartz lenses.
